subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Largely lost in the hoopla of the Lakers’ Christmas Day victory over the Celtics was Phil Jackson becoming the sixth coach to reach 1,000 victories and the fastest coach to do so, surpassing Pat Riley.
snippet: Largely lost in the hoopla of the Lakers’ Christmas Day victory over the Celtics was Phil Jackson becoming the sixth coach to reach 1,000 victories and the fastest coach to do so, surpassing Pat Riley.
